description: Single Pane of Glass for the TokenLabs AI inference fleet. Provides tenant-level billing visibility, hardware health, and prefix cache efficiency.

panels.description: P50 / P95 / P99 Time to First Token across the entire fleet, filtered by model and GPU node.
panels.title: Time to First Token (TTFT)

panels.description: P50 / P95 / P99 Time Per Output Token (inter-token latency) across the fleet.
panels.title: Time Per Output Token (TPOT)

panels.description: Percentage of requests completed successfully (HTTP 2xx) versus total requests across the fleet.
panels.title: Request Success Rate

panels.description: Current number of requests actively running on inference engines.
panels.title: Running Requests

panels.description: Fleet-wide request throughput (requests per second).
panels.title: Throughput (Requests/s)

panels.description: Current number of requests queued, waiting for a GPU slot.
panels.title: Queued Requests

panels.description: Input and output token throughput (tokens/sec) broken down by API key. Filter using $api_key variable to isolate a specific tenant.
panels.title: Token Throughput by API Key (Input vs Output)

panels.description: Top 10 most active API keys by total token consumption (input + output) over the selected time range.
panels.title: Top 10 Most Active API Keys

panels.description: Per-tenant rate limit hit events — spikes indicate a tenant hitting their token quota.
panels.title: Rate Limit Hit Events by Tenant

panels.description: KV Cache utilisation across all vLLM pods in the InferencePool. Values near 100% indicate memory pressure and will cause request queuing.
panels.title: KV Cache Usage — InferencePool Average

panels.description: KV Cache usage per individual GPU node over time. Use the $gpu_node variable to filter.
panels.title: KV Cache Usage % per GPU Node

panels.description: RDMA / RoCE network throughput per GPU node (NVIDIA NIC metrics via DCGM). High throughput indicates active tensor-parallel or disaggregated prefill/decode communication.
panels.title: RDMA / RoCE Throughput per Node

panels.description: GPU memory used versus total available on each node (DCGM framebuffer metrics).
panels.title: GPU Framebuffer Memory per Node

panels.description: GPU compute utilization (SM active%) per GPU device on each node. Sustained values near 100% indicate the GPU is fully saturated with inference work.
panels.title: GPU Utilization % per Device

panels.description: GPU junction temperature in Celsius per device. GB10 GPUs throttle above ~87°C.
panels.title: GPU Temperature per Device

panels.description: Instantaneous GPU power draw in Watts per device. Useful for fleet energy budgeting and detecting thermal/power throttling.
panels.title: GPU Power Draw (W) per Device

panels.description: Tensor Core pipe activity ratio (0–1) from DCGM profiling counters. High values confirm the model is leveraging hardware-accelerated matrix operations (FP16/BF16/FP8 Tensor Cores).
panels.title: GPU Profiling — Tensor / GR Engine / DRAM Activity

panels.description: SM (shader) and memory clock frequencies in MHz. Clock throttling below base frequency indicates thermal or power limits.
panels.title: GPU SM & Memory Clock Frequency

panels.description: NVIDIA XID error events per GPU. Any non-zero value signals a hardware fault (ECC errors, page faults, etc.) and warrants immediate investigation.
panels.title: GPU XID Errors (Hardware Faults)

panels.description: Overall prefix cache hit rate from llm-d metrics. A high hit rate means the smart router is successfully steering requests with matching prefixes to warmed-up pods, reducing TTFT.
panels.title: Prefix Cache Hit Rate

panels.description: Cache hit and miss rates over time. A growing gap between hits and misses confirms the smart router is working effectively.
panels.title: Prefix Cache Hit / Miss Rate

panels.description: Prefix cache hit/miss breakdown per GPU node. Uneven distribution may indicate sub-optimal routing decisions.
panels.title: Cache Hit / Miss per Node

panels.description: Estimated TTFT savings from prefix cache hits. Cached prefixes skip prefill processing, reducing latency.
panels.title: TTFT vs Cache Hit Rate Correlation

title: TokenLabs — AI Factory (Multi-Tenant)
